title: Will the Mobile WiFi connect to the Internet automatically if I roam to a different network?
answer:
A:

 Please check the connection mode of your Mobile WiFi firstly.

l  Auto mode:

n    Automatically connect even when roaming is selected by default. If you roam to a different network with the Mobile WiFi, it will automatically disconnect an established network connection. If you need to access the Internet from the new network, you must re-establish a network connection.

n    If Automatically connect even when roaming is not selected, the established network connection will not be effected by roaming state of the network
